00016 const SimpleString CommonServiceValues::DefaultDomain = "_bip._tcp";
00017 SimpleString CommonServiceValues::OmiscidServiceDnsSdType(""); // help for debug or defining subdomain
00018 
00019 namespace Omiscid {
00020 
00021 // We need to initialise OmiscidServiceDnsSdType from environment variable
00022 class OmiscidDnsSdTypeInitClass : CommonServiceValues
00023 {
00024 public:
00025         OmiscidDnsSdTypeInitClass()
00026         {
00027                 char * Option = getenv( "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN" );
00028                 if ( Option == NULL || strcmp( Option, DefaultDomain.GetStr() ) == 0 )
00029                 {
00030                         OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = DefaultDomain;
00031                         OmiscidTrace( "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN not override. Use '%s'.\n", DefaultDomain.GetStr() );
00032                         return;
00033                 }
00034 
00035                 // Copy the environment variable
00036                 size_t size = strlen( Option );
00037                 TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmpdomain(128);
00038 
00039                 if ( size >= RegtypeLength )
00040                 {
00041                         OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = CommonServiceValues::DefaultDomain;
00042                         fprintf( stderr, "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN too long (%d max). Use '%s' instead.\n", RegtypeLength-1, DefaultDomain.GetStr() );
00043                         return;
00044                 }
00045 
00046                 if ( sscanf( Option, "_bip_%[^.]._tcp", (char*)tmpdomain) != 1 )
00047                 {
00048                         OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = DefaultDomain;
00049                         OmiscidError( "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN do not look like '_bip_XXX._tcp'. Use '%s' instead.\n", DefaultDomain.GetStr() );
00050                         return;
00051                 }
00052 
00053                 CommonServiceValues::OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = Option;
00054 
00055                 OmiscidTrace( "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN defined in environment variable. Use '%s'.\n", OmiscidServiceDnsSdType.GetStr() );
00056         };
00057 };
00058 
00059 static OmiscidDnsSdTypeInitClass OmiscidServiceDnsSdTypeInitClassInitialisationObject;
00060 
00061 } // namespace Omiscid
